001package imagingbook.common.image.matching;
002
003/** 
004 * Enum type for different distance norms used to calculate distance transforms. 
005 * 
006 * @see DistanceTransform
007 */
008public enum DistanceNorm {
009        /** L1 distance (Manhattan distance) */ L1, 
010        /** L2 distance (Euclidean distance) */ L2;
011}
